formintro:
To protect you against frauds and scams we monitor transaction into and out of Solidi.

We have some questions regarding a withdraw which has been flagged by our transaction monitoring system.

We have provided details of the transaction in the form below. Please complete the form by providing details of the recipient / destination of the transfer to help us understand the purpose of the withdraw.

questions.guidance: Please provide additional details for the previous answer.

questions.label: Receiver Details

questions.label: Receiver

questions.label: Purpose of the transfer

questions.label: Expected Frequency

questions.label: Supporting Documents
questions.guidance: Please upload any supporting documents, screenshots, emails, to support the details above. (you can upload multiple documents)
